title: Bigfoot at Bluff Creek -  The Evidence
description:
Tonight, my special guest is Bigfoot researcher M.K. Davis to discuss the detailed research into the famous Patterson/Gimlin film shot in 1967.


Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
